mil6.1.1:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil6.1.1:0.4_0: Sense Following of the two noble ones,
mil6.1.1:1.1_0: “When the Buddha spoke like this, he said,
mil6.1.1:1.2_0: They understand: ‘It’s impossible for two perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas to arise in the same solar system at the same time.
mil6.1.1:1.3_0: Let them teach the Dhamma so that they’re taught by the Realized One, and the seven awakening factors. But they reveal them to the teaching undecided the training proclaimed by the Realized One.
mil6.1.1:1.4_0: What if only one day I passed by all of them,mpathy for two days after the Realized One? How does just one train them?
mil6.1.1:1.5_0: Since this world is born in a single Blessed One—whether in accordance with the Buddha—a Buddha would instruct two eons, three, four, five, ten, twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths; many eons of the world contracting, many eons of the world expanding, I’ll teach you.”
mil6.1.1:10.1_0: Alms, the first awakened Buddhas, and the first manifests.
mil6.1.1:2.1_0: “Great king, a single galaxy extends for a single world—with its gods, Māras, and Brahmās, by a Realized One—who could blow up the Buddha, the Perfected One, the fully Awakened One would grab it, and make it clear.
mil6.1.1:3.1_0: You couldn’t get by boaters with a single harness.
mil6.1.1:3.2_0: But if a second person were to come along with all these marks of life, beauty, happiness, glory, so wouldn’t remember that, not wear, and exhausted?”
mil6.1.1:3.3_0: “No, sir, it’s not proper for us to place it, throw it out, or disappeared on the spot.
mil6.1.1:3.4_0: “In the same way, great king, this galaxy extends for a single solar systems, or a single mass of the world—when it comes to the world, and the Buddha wouldn’t make it known.
mil6.1.1:4.1_0: Or suppose a person was to eat as much as they like until their balls filled with food, creepers wrapped in skin and full of weather, and weather-damaged, fertile, and well kept. Would this person ate the food regrating and rugh’s ruged once again?”
mil6.1.1:4.2_0: “No, Sir, it’s not easy to die until you die.”
mil6.1.1:4.3_0: “In the same way, great king, this galaxy extends for a single solar systems, or a single mass of the world—when it comes to the world, and the Buddha wouldn’t make them climb up and down the cliff, and the tenth of the worldth.
mil6.1.1:5.1_0: “Sir, what do you gain united earth?”
mil6.1.1:5.2_0: “Great king, suppose there were two precious things with picked up by a caravan leader. Wouldn’t they grab it all around, then the carts, the carts, and the carts would be remembered?”
mil6.1.1:5.3_0: Because that’s not any fruit, nor would they be said to each arrow.”
mil6.1.1:5.4_0: “Great king, why do you carrie the cart-treasure?”
mil6.1.1:5.6_0: “In the same way, there are transformed by the moths and the earth.
mil6.1.1:6.1_0: Still, great king, this is the power of the Buddha.
mil6.1.1:6.2_0: It’s because of this sort of person for the sake of buy to listen to the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha.
mil6.1.1:6.3_0: If two fully awakened Buddhas might arise in the assembly hall,
mil6.1.1:6.4_0: In the same way, if two fully awakened Buddhas were given up each other in the assembly, their dispute would arise in us.
mil6.1.1:6.5_0: This, great king, is the one fortune, took only two fully awakened Buddhas in one part of the day.
mil6.1.1:7.1_0: And for a further effort to stop the practice, for grandchānaṅga, for two fully awakened Buddhas.
mil6.1.1:7.2_0: If, great king, you were to say, ‘the Buddha has laid down the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the summaries, ‘Awakened One,’ ‘the awakened one’, a Buddha has comprehended the wrong path.’
mil6.1.1:7.3_0: There are, great king, for the sake of this it to weariving just one, the two fully awakened Buddhas.
mil6.1.1:8.10_0: and only Māra to the other.
mil6.1.1:8.12_0: The Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha is the world.
mil6.1.1:8.13_0: Wherever they arise there is no other. That’s why the Realized One does not arise in the world, perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha.”
mil6.1.1:8.1_0: But for which Buddhas arise in the world, the Buddhas and the instructions of the Buddhas arises.
mil6.1.1:8.3_0: of great compassionate for all beings.
mil6.1.1:8.4_0: The very same thing, when it comes to the world, it’s just one brahmin.
mil6.1.1:8.5_0: a great earth, great king, a big lump of earth.
mil6.1.1:8.6_0: and that big bull elephant still alone.
mil6.1.1:8.8_0: the great sage, the one is always.
mil6.1.1:9.2_0: When you’ve heard it, what would you be pleased?
mil6.1.1:9.3_0: Sir, please accept this way from Nāgadatta.”
